body:
@msareen This is an issue with `electron-inspector` using hidden internals of the `electron-rebuild` module which have since changed.  If you lock `electron-rebuild` to `1.4.x` in your package.json this issue will disappear.

The root cause for this issue needs to be fixed at it's source though in `electron-inspector`

I tried locking it to version 1.4.x, and saw some progress, but it failed with following error. 

```
node-inspector binaries are incompatible or missing.
Attempting to rebuild...
Rebuilding native node-inspector modules for Electron 1.6.6
Rebuilding C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules/v8-profiler
node-pre-gyp fixer: C:/Data/Applications/DupsFinders/node_modules/electron-inspector/node_modules/v8-profiler/build/prof                                                    iler/v5.6.5/electron-v1.6-win32-x64 copied to C:/Data/Applications/DupsFinders/node_modules/electron-inspector/node_modu                                                    les/v8-profiler/build/profiler/v5.6.5/node-v53-win32-x64
Rebuilding C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules/v8-debug

> v8-debug@0.7.7 preinstall C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug
> node -e 'process.exit(0)'


> v8-debug@0.7.7 install C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug
> node-pre-gyp install --fallback-to-build

..\src\debug.cc(46): error C2660: 'v8::Debug::GetDebugContext': function does not take 0 arguments [C:\Data\Applications                                                    \DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug\build\debug.vcxproj]
..\src\debug.cc(46): error C2227: left of '->GetIsolate' must point to class/struct/union/generic type [C:\Data\Applicat                                                    ions\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug\build\debug.vcxproj]
..\src\debug.cc(61): error C2660: 'v8::Debug::GetDebugContext': function does not take 0 arguments [C:\Data\Applications                                                    \DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug\build\debug.vcxproj]

Failed to execute 'C:\Program Files\nodejs\node.exe C:\Data\Applications\node_modules\node-gyp\bin\node-gyp.js build --f                                                    allback-to-build --module=C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_modules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug\build\d                                                    ebug\v0.7.7\electron-v1.6-win32-x64\debug.node --module_name=debug --module_path=C:\Data\Applications\DupsFinders\node_m                                                    odules\electron-inspector\node_modules\v8-debug\build\debug\v0.7.7\electron-v1.6-win32-x64' (1)
```

Is there is a easy/another way to debug electron main process step by step ?
